extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hitbox

        public Hitbox(boolean fromPlayer,
      int damage,
      float x,
      float y,
      float width,
      float height,
      long DurationInMS,
      float xVelocity,
      float yVelocity)
        Creates a new hitbox
        Parameters:
        fromPlayer - Whether the hitbox was released by the player
        damage - Damage the hitbox deals
        x - X value of hitbox
        y - Y value of hitbox
        width - Width of hitbox
        height - Height of hitbox
        DurationInMS - Duration of hitbox's existence
        xVelocity - X velocity component
        yVelocity - Y velocity component

        public boolean getFriendly()
        Specifies whether the hitbox was created by the player or by an enemy
        Returns:
        True if from the player, false otherwise
